author: Simon Difford
description: Vanilla, chocolate and a hint of nut. Enjoy as an altern'atini or add more sugar syrup to make this into a dessert cocktail.
name: DC Martini
recipeIngredient: 60 ml White (charcoal-filtered) 1-4 year old light rum (infused with vanilla)
7.5 ml White crème de cacao liqueur
2.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)
10 ml Chilled water (omit if wet ice)

recipeInstructions.text: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass
